title: Paraduxx 2018 Proprietary Red (Napa Valley)
description: Made from a majority of Cabernet Sauvignon, with additions of Zinfandel, Petit Verdot, Petite Sirah, Syrah and Cabernet Franc, this is a substantial wine with plush, generous tannins and oak. Cedar, dried herb and tobacco complement the rich black fruit.

title: Pizzolato NV Brut  (Prosecco)
description: This has delicate aromas recalling spring blossoms and stone fruit. Certified organic and vegan, the vibrant, lively palate offers banana and green melon alongside brisk acidity.

title: Planeta 2019  Cerasuolo di Vittoria
description: Mature dark-skinned fruit and vineyard dust aromas waft out of the glass along with a whiff of rusty iron. On the smooth palate, relaxed tannins accompany dried cherry, blood orange and steely mineral.

title: Quinta da Lapa 2017 Maria Rapaz Reserve Red (Tejo)
description: Now mature, this spicy, berry fruit and toasty wine has a bite of pepper, acidity and an attractive red fruit aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Quinta da Lapa 2019 Nana White (Tejo)
description: The wine is all fresh citrus, crisp acidity and bright, complex lightness. It is an attractive wine, lightly textured and ready to drink.

title: Sanfeletto NV Brut  (Conegliano Valdobbiadene Prosecco Superiore)
description: Aromas of white spring blossoms and green apple follow through to the soft, creamy palate along with green melon, a dollop of vanilla and bright acidity. A hint of bitter almond marks the close.
